data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is situated at the top-right corner of the website. It is visible on the homepage and maintains its position even when the sign-in form is displayed.

data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website. Additionally, users should be able to sign in using a combination of their username or email and password.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button remains easily visible throughout the pages. The sign-in form allows the input of a username or email and password.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users to recover forgotten passwords.
data.observation: There is a 'Forgot Password' link provided on the sign-in form for users to recover their forgotten passwords.
data.suggestions: Ensure that the 'Forgot Password' process is straightforward and user-friendly.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.observation: There is no visible option in the provided screenshots for users to recover a forgotten email address.
data.suggestions: Implement an email recovery process with clear instructions for users who have forgotten their email addresses.

data.title: Ensure there is an option for users to 'Remember My Details'.
data.observation: There is no visible option for 'Remember My Details' in the sign-in form.
data.suggestions: Include a 'Remember My Details' checkbox in the sign-in form to enhance user convenience for future logins.

data.title: Ensure the site features helpful error messaging that triggers only when fields are incorrectly input, ensuring users receive clear guidance to correct mistakes effectively.
data.observation: An error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed when incorrect sign-in information is provided.
data.suggestions: Ensure error messages also provide suggestions or steps for users to correct the mistakes.

data.title: Ensure CAPTCHA or other anti-bot measures are implemented during sign-in to enhance security and prevent automated attacks, thereby safeguarding user accounts and maintaining the integrity of the login process.
data.observation: There is no visible CAPTCHA or anti-bot measure implemented in the sign-in process.
data.suggestions: Implement CAPTCHA or other anti-bot security measures to enhance login security.

data.title: Ensure that error messaging is clear and concise, providing users with specific reasons for the error encountered and clear instructions on the next steps to resolve the issue effectively.
data.observation: The error message 'Invalid credentials' is short and provides a general reason for the error without specific guidance on how to resolve it.
data.suggestions: Enhance the error message to provide specific reasons for the error and steps for users to resolve the issue effectively.
